data.title: Pizza News Archives
data.text:
.

.

.

Report: Restaurant Transactions Up, Check Average Down

Consumer spending stabilized in September at restaurants, where more robust transaction growth offset heavier declines in average checks, according to payment processor First Data.

Burke Corporation Announces Fully Cooked Buffalo-Style Chicken Breast Strips

Burke Corporation, an industry leader in fully cooked meat products, today announced the launch of its new, fully cooked Buffalo-Style Chicken Breast Strips (product code 09814, size: Â¼-inch-strip cut pieces) under its MagniFoodsÂ® brand.

Sixth Annual Oregon Truffle Festival Features Feast and Farm with Wine & Truffle Tastings

Old World Italy will meet New World Oregon for a celebration of the Season of Truffles at the 2011 Oregon Truffle Festival, to be held in the beautiful Willamette and McKenzie ballrooms of the Valley River Inn.

Pizza Inn Celebrates National Pizza Month with Loaded Baked Pottao Pizza Debut

Pizza Inn, Inc. (NASDAQ:PZZI) is celebrating National Pizza Month this October with a new item on its menu: the Loaded Baked Potato Pizza.

Home Run Inn Opens First Drive-Thru Location

Melrose is the Place to be! Home Run Inn pizzerias, home to Chicagoâ€™s Premium Thin-Crust Pizza, opened a Melrose Park express location, at 820 W. North Ave., complete with the companyâ€™s first drive-thru, September 14.

GreenBox to be Honored at the Responsible Packaging Awards, October 14, 2010

ECOvention, LLC announced today that their flagship product the GreenBox will be honored at the Responsible Packaging Awards on October 14, 2010 at 4:00 PM at the Boston Convention Center.

Flippers Pizzeria Utilizes Some of The Best Brick Ovens in the Business

Today, Flippers Pizzeria released details about the origins and design of their famous brick ovens, now used in all of their Central Florida restaurants.

Sofo Foods Establishes New Distribution Center in Houston, Texas Area

Antonio Sofo & Son Importing Co. (Sofo Foods), one of the largest ethnic food distributors in the Midwest, announced that they have established a food service warehouse and distribution operation in the greater Houston, Texas area.

Wolfgang Puck LA Bistro To Be Replaced By Pizzeria Urbano

According to LA.Eater.com, “5063093483_24bb1b2a64.jpgEven more pizza appearing in LA. Currently in the works comes Olio Pizzeria on 3rd and Pizzeria Il Fico on Robertson, and now downtownsters can brace for Pizzeria Urbano, a concept conceived by Michael Leko and Peter Gedde.

Hungry Howies Pizza Helps Raise Money For Breast Cancer

According to the American Cancer Society, an estimated 207,090 new cases of invasive breast cancer are expected to be diagnosed among U.S. women in 2010.

It’s The Pizza, Stupid: Carville Makes Pi Stop For Carnahan

Accordingt to STLToday.com.com, “A day before collecting cash with the vice president, Democrat Robin Carnahan brought in another party heavyweight to stump for her Senate campaign.”

Congratulations to Pizza PatrÃ³n, PMQ’s 2010 Pizza Industry Enterprise (PIE) Award winner!

While the industry was abuzz this past year with large pizza chains changing their formulations and rethinking marketing efforts, when we sat down to choose a recipient for our annual Pizza Industry Enterprise (PIE) Award, we wanted to select a company thatâ€™s been steadily growing over the yearsâ€”in both unit counts and salesâ€”as well as one that has stayed true to its original mission. The choice was easy with Pizza PatrÃ³n.

October Culinary Nutrition News Examines Foodborne Illnesses

From eggs to tomatoes and from spinach to peanut butter, common kitchen ingredients can easily be contaminated, resulting in foodborne illnesses. The October issue of â€œCulinary Nutrition News,â€ presented by the American Culinary Federation Chef & Child Foundation (CCF) and Clemson University, Clemson, S.C., explains causes of foodborne illness, examines several recent cases and offers chefs tips on how to avoid an outbreak. To download the free article, visit www.acfchefs.org/CNN.

New York City, Phoenix Latest to Get Naked

Naked Pizza awarded multi-unit franchising rights in two of the most important pizza markets in the United States â€“ New York City and Phoenix, Arizona.

Tutta Bella Host Swedish Medical Center Traveling Pink Chair in October

Tutta Bella Neapolitan Pizzerias are proud to support National Breast Cancer Awareness Month, by hosting a Swedish Medical Center True Family Womenâ€™s Cancer Center â€œTraveling Pink Chairâ€ during the month of October.

Domino’s Pizza Pontyclun Celebrates its New Store With a Buy One Get One Free

Domino’s Pizza Pontyclun is set to open its doors today for the very first time today and to celebrate the occasion, the pizza store is offering a range of exclusive offers and discounts for customers in the South Wales area.

Pi Pizzeria Expanding With New D.C. Location

Accordingt to STLToday.com, “President Barack Obama soon won’t have to dial long distance for his favorite pizza.”

One Size Fits All With Rice Lakes Versa-Portion Bench Scale

Brand new this fall is Rice Lakeâ€™s Versa-portion RLP-S compact bench scale. Just as the name implies, versatility is perhaps the biggest selling point of the sturdy new model, with its stainless steel construction, IP68 rating, and a broad range of useful features.

Marzetti Frozen Pasta so many shapes, al dente in 30-60 seconds

-Marzettiâ€™s convenient, fully-cooked pasta and noodles offer consistently perfect results every time, with less labor and no waste. Theyâ€™re made from the finest ingredients then frozen and portion-packed for a fresh taste that customers will love.

Ed Hardy Tatooed Pizza Boxes in San Francisco

According to SF.Eater.com, “Tony Gemignani of North Beach’s Tony’s Pizza Napoletana has partnered up with loyal customer and local tattoo artist Ed Hardy to create 10,000 special pizza boxes with the goal of raising $10,000 for each of his favorite charities.”

Grab a Slice, Pour the Wine and Celebrate National Pizza Month

October is National Pizza Month, though Americans don’t need a special month to indulge in this lunch and dinnertime favorite.

Revention Releases Mobile Ordering App For iPhone

With todayâ€™s increasing demand for mobile ordering apps, Revention is proud to announce the addition of its iPhone ordering app to their online family of products.

And The Central Kentucky Winner Is: Goodfellas Pizzeria

According to kentucky.com, “When the staff at PizzaOvens.com decided to have a pizza bake-off, they turned to an expert to decide who makes the best pizza in Central Kentucky.”

Obama Gives Tutta Bella Pizzeria A Shout Out

According to SeattlePI.com, “President Barack Obama did a little name dropping Monday.”

Wolfman Pizza First In Carolinas To Use Eco-Friendly Pizza Box

In celebration of National Pizza Month in October, locally owned Wolfman Pizza reaffirms its commitment to the environment and its enviro-conscious customers by adopting the eco-friendly GreenBoxâ„¢, an invention created by Ecovention, LLC of New York, N.Y.

Top College Logos Now Available on Pizza!

Tacoma, WA â€“ Pizza Festâ„¢ Edible ImageÂ® designs are now available in your favorite collegiate logos. Twelve colleges are inventoried and nearly 100 colleges are available for custom order. Some top inventoried colleges are Michigan State, University of Florida, University of Iowa and Arizona State.

Google’s Pizza Ad: Man Repeats Word For 10 Minutes

According to the Huffington Post, “There was once a time when advertising by Google was rare. Then came the Super Bowl ad. Now this.”
